TopicTitle: Custom made star receiving sunlight from Kerbol

Articles.Content:
Hello people,

I would like to get some help on a star I'm creating. It clearly receives light from the stock the Sun/Kerbol. How can I fix this? 

Thank you very much for helping
You need to add an intensity curve for the stock sun. Also, you will need to make an intensity curve for your star so that the stock sun doesn’t receive light from it

28 minutes ago, Galileo said:

You need to add an intensity curve for the stock sun. Also, you will need to make an intensity curve for your star so that the stock sun doesn’t receive light from it

Okay, I figured it out but my custom made star is still receiving light from the Sun.

 

Edited October 22, 2017 by ApertureGaming
